body_html:
@ezyang seems like a fine name to me. I think with a few of these tweaks and cpp_extension, extensions are going to look really clean. Please let me know if there is anything else you want me to do on this PR.

On a related note, the only part of the extension that still looks kind of ugly to me is making the descriptor. I'm calling cudnnSetTensorNdDescriptor myself, but I would rather just use TensorDescriptor. I will add another PR to export TensorDescriptor if that makes sense.

Thanks!
